name: query
description: The search query used to find relevant articles

name: k
description: Number of top articles to retrieve

name: file
description: Path to the source parquet file

name: text_index
description: Index of the text in the file

name: text
description: Full text content of the article including title, description, provider, etc

name: reasoning
description: Explanation of why this article is relevant

name: rank
description: Ranking position of the article in the results
